ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: --  From: EvertorN  ... Heh i had the very same money problem at your level and i accepted it. I bought the spells first and only
ygData.messageBody:
-- From: EvertorN <evertorn@...>
>Hi, After playing about 3 characters, I decided to make another, and so
>far I really like my cleric. One problem I can't seem to solve is the
>money issue. How did u guys get the spells and armor you needed? I
>figure my lvl 9 spells will cost me near 25pp, and I still have my
>newbie armor, and a rusty warhammer, nothing else...to get all leather
>armor would cost me around 25-30pp...I'm currently lvl 7, and I have
>10pp to my name. It's a start, yes, but no where near where it needs to
>be.
>Even after this, how did you get money for the more exp spells?
>This money issue is driving me crazy.

Heh i had the very same money problem at your level and i accepted
it. I bought the spells first and only then i thought about buying upgrades
to my armor. At level 14 my warrior friend asked me why am i still wearing
that leather armor. After that level i started to get some decent loot and
got banded armor quite fast and kept that until reaching level 20 and then
i started looking for some bronze... still missing a few pieces. Right now
i have about 180pp... not much. Runnyeye Citadel was the place i got
most of my money since people are really after the black iron armor.

Iyenya Goldenheart
Lvl 23 dwarf cleric
Innoruuk server
